title: Victoria Empress of India 1877
medium:
Medium: silk, metal threads
Technique: embroidery on satin weave
description: Circular medallion embroidered with Queen Victoria's coat of arms: a shield divided in four quarters, with the three lions of England in the first and fourth quarters, the lion of Scotland in the second, and the harp of Ireland in the third. The shield is surrounded by sheaves of wheat. At top center is embroidered "Victoria Empress of India," and at botton center "1877."  Embroidered in blue, green, brown, white and gold on a peach satin ground.
name: Coat of arms
